Venues.Message:
Pre-booked food & beverages have to be collected by the patrons from the express food counter by showing a valid booking id.
Kindly check your showtimes while booking as there are mid-night shows available as well.
Ticket price inclusive of 3D glass charges.
1. Patrons under the age of 18 are strictly prohibited entry to A rated movies by law Please note tickets once booked for underaged patrons will not be refunded under any circumstances.
 2. Please carry proof of age for movies certified `A`.
3. Tickets once purchased cannot be cancelled, exchanged or refunded.
4. Tickets purchased online are not eligible for discounts, schemes or promotions of any kind.
5. To collect tickets from the Box Office, it is mandatory for the cardholder to be present in person with the card used for the transaction, along with the booking confirmation (SMS/computer printout) to help minimize the risk of fraud.
6. Online bookings on our site are carried out over a secure payment gateway.
7. Tickets purchased online for a particular multiplex are valid for that multiplex only.
8. Please purchase tickets for children 3 years and above.
9. To counter unforeseen delays, please collect your tickets half an hour before show time.
10. Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside the cinema premises.
11. A convenience fee per ticket is levied on all tickets booked online.
12. Ticket holders are required to abide by the policies laid down by the AGS Cinemas management.
13. Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the theatre premises.
14. People under the influence of Alcohol/Drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
15. Parking for two-wheelers and four-wheelers will be provided in the theatre complex or its annex for patrons.
 16. Tickets and F&B amount will be fully refunded in the same mode of payment in case of cancelled shows due to unforeseen tech
Venues.VenueAdd: Vivira Mall, 5th Floor, Navalur, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Near ETA Techno Park Entrance, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 603103, India

Venues.Message:
1. Wearing a face mask and following other Covid guidelines are mandatory (As per the directions from your local authorities)..
2. Rights Of Admission Reserved.
3. Tickets Once Issued Cannot Be Cancelled, Exchanged Or Refunded.
4. Tickets Issued Are Valid Only For The Displayed Show Date & Time.
5. Show Timing Are Subject To Change.
6. Re-Entry Upon Exit From The Complex During Show Time Is Prohibited.
7. Patrons Below The Age Of 18 Years Will Not Be Granted Entry Into `A` Rated Movie.
8. Children Over 3 Years Of Age Require A Ticket For Entry Into The Screens.
9. Outside Food Is Not Allowed Into The Complex.
10. Smoking, Drinking, Chewing Paan And Spitting Are Strictly Prohibited Within The Complex Premises.
11. Person`s Under The Influence Of Alcohol/ Drugs Will Not Be Admitted Into The Complex.
12. Management Will Not Be Responsible For Any Loss Or Damage Of Personal Belongings.
13. Misuse Of The Theatre Property Is Punishable By Law.
14. Please Retain The Ticket At All Times Within The Premises.
15. Black Ticketing And Indiscipline Behavior Will Lead To Eviction From The Complex Premises.
16. If a Show Is Cancelled, Responsibility Of Management Is Limited To The Face Value Of The Ticket.
17. Use Of Photo And Video Camera & Recording Through Mobile Phones Is Strictly Prohibited Within The Theatre Premises.
18. For Enquiries, Suggestion And Feedback Please Write To Us Customercare@Mayajaal.Com.
Venues.VenueAdd: No. 34/1, East Coast Road, Kanathur, Near Toll Plaza, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 603112, India

Venues.Message:
1. People under the influence of Alcohol/Drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises and Cinema reserves the right of Admission.
2. Tickets are required for children 3 years and above.
3. Outside Food and Beverage is not allowed inside the cinema premises.
4. Tickets for A-rated movies should not be purchased for people under 18 years of age.
5. Tickets once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
6. Smoking is strictly not permitted inside the cinema premises. Gutkha and Pan Masala will not be allowed inside the premises.
7. Rights of admission reserved by the cinema management.
Venues.VenueAdd: No. 4/347 Velachery Main Road, Medavakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600100, India

Venues.Message:
1. Auto and Auto parking will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
2. 3D Glass charges (Rs.30) will be levied in the Box Office counter while collecting your online tickets for all 3D movies screening in the cinema.
3. Shows are subject to cancellation due to low occupancy.
4 People under the influence of Alcohol/Drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises and ticket amount will not be refunded.
5. Outside Food and Beverage is not allowed inside the cinema premises.
6. Ticket required for children 3 years and above.
7. Tickets for A rated movies should not be purchased for people under 18 years of age.
8. Please carry proof of age for movies certified A.
9. Tickets once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
10. Smoking is strictly not permitted inside the cinema premises. Gutkha and Pan Masala will not be allowed inside the premises.
Venues.VenueAdd: Rajaji Road, West Tambaram, Near Lenovo Store, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600045, India

Venues.Message:
1. Children below the age of 18 cannot be admitted for movies certified `A`.
2. Please carry proof of age for movies certified `A`.
3. Tickets are mandatory for children above the age of 3.
4. Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside the cinema premises.
5. In case of any difficulty or discrepancy during the booking of tickets online, please approach Rohini Silver Screens ticket kiosk or write to hello@rohinisilverscreens.com
5. Smoking and alcohol is strictly prohibited inside the theatre premises. No patron is allowed inside the premises if they have consumed alcohol.
6. 3D glasses must be handled with care and returned after the movie while exiting.
7. A replacement fee of Rs. 150 will be imposed for each pair of damaged 3D glasses.
8. Auto Parking is not allowed.
Venues.VenueAdd: 141/2, Poonamallee High Road, Koyembedu, Near St. Thomas College Of Arts And Science, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600107, India
